preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 8 grams of arsenic using a digital scale.
2. Measure 6 grams of nickel.
3. Measure 6 grams of palladium.
4. In a fume hood or well-ventilated area, combine all three materials in a clean, dry mixing container.
5. Use a spatula to mix the powders thoroughly to ensure uniform distribution of the components.
